text: I am trying to remove a post tag from my blog feed. I tried using this bit of code but its not working. {% if tag.name == ‘Activity Calendars’ %}style=“display: none;“{% endif %}
When I paste the code I am getting a syntax error. mismatched end tag
you're missing an `{% endif %}` statement after `{{ topic.name }}`

Hi all, I'm trying to show an embed code in the editor UI, so the editors can copy/paste to different areas of the page, emails, etc. I'm compiling the code in a custom module (which is loaded in the head) , can print the values (rendered html and escaped html) in the page, but not in the UI. Is it possible? I was trying to  use as default value in a field, but it just shows the variable storing the html? (use case: add to calendar links built with values defined by the editor - should appear to the editor as code)
